暆字的基本解释

暆
yí
〔暆暆〕太阳缓慢移动的样子。
（太阳）西斜：“坐待日暆。”

暆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》弋支切，平支，以。］
(1)日徐行；日西斜。
(2)地名用字。汉有东暆县，北朝有东暆道。

暆字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暆； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页497第35
【唐韻】弋支切【集韻】【韻會】余支切，?音移。【說文】日行暆暆。【越絕書】日昭昭浸以暆，與子期兮蘆之漪。　又地名。【前漢·地理志】樂浪郡東暆。

暆字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
暆字的起名意思

暂无。

Sigh
Basic explanation of words
Sigh
yí
〔暆暆〕The way the sun is moving slowly.
(Sun) Westward: "Sit down and wait for the sun."
Sigh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" Yi branch cut, flat branch, to. ]
(1) The day goes slowly; the day is inclined to the west.
(2) Words used in place names. There was Dongxun County in the Han Dynasty and Dongxun Road in the Northern Dynasty.
Sigh
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　暆; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 497 35
[Tang Yun] Yi branch cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] remaining branch cut, sound shifted. [Speaking text] The daily trip is fascinating. [Yue Jueshu] Ri Zhaozhao is immersed in Xin, and Zi Qi Xi Lu Zhiyi.　Also place name. [Former Han·Geography] Dongxun, Lelang County.
